1.content: Alright, the first question: What gender is this child?
1.title: Starting out

choices: They throw tantrums and fits about the potty.
Doesn't seem to get the concepts.
11.content:
Alright, a boy.

Now then, let's identify what this boy's 'problem', regarding their toilet training is. What's keeping them from using the potty?
11.title: Boy

111.content: Alright, so they're taking, relatively, forever to train. Now, how old is the potty trainee?
111.title: They're taking forever to train.

1113.content: Forever, you say? So are we talking…
1113.title: 4 and above

11131.content:
Alright, so the child is in preschool, or maybe even early Kindergarten. So, here are some lads to choose from:

Carter-age 4 and 1/2. Has been adamantly against potty training. His mom has thought of sending him diapered or in Pull-Ups to preschool. She hopes that his peers being all out of diapers, except perhaps at night, will peer pressure him into using the potty.

Lucas-Age 4. On and off again potty user, has been since he started. Sometimes he goes a whole day only using the potty, accidents aside. Sometimes he'll only use his training pants. Sometimes it'll be a mix.
11131.title: …preschooler (4 to 5 years)

112.content:
Tobias, age two. His parents tried to go cold turkey with him and just took him out of his diapers one day and presented him with the potty. Tobias loves his new big boy undies but he hates the potty. He hates it, hates it hates it! He will start crying whenever his mommy or daddy make him sit on it for even just a second. He will happily pee on a tree or in the grass – or, more often than not, his big boy undies or the carpet. Just not in the potty.

Raphael, age three. Raphael lives with his single dad and he has just discovered his new favourite word: ‘No.’ At first Raphael made good progress with his potty training, he even had had a few completely accident-free days. But recently, just sitting on the potty has become a giant power struggle with him that usually ends in tears and wet pants.

Noah, age four. Noah’s parents recently divorced. They share custody over him and he spends half the month at his mom’s and the other half with his dad. Noah was fully potty trained over a year ago, but he did not take well to the stress and the new situation and right now he refuses to even sit on the toilet. He will deny he even has to go and only moments later go hide to wet or soil his pants, then he’ll claim it was an accident.

Logan, age five. Logan’s dad once told him that he had to learn to do a thing first before he was allowed to decide he didn’t like it. At the time, his dad had tried to teach Logan, who could be a bit of a scaredy-cat, to ride a bike and that was what he had been talking about. And once Logan had gotten the hang of it, he actually had decided he liked riding his bicycle very much. However, he had taken his dad’s advice to heart and identified a few other things in his life which he definitely knew how to do but decidedly did not like. Using the potty was one of them. His mom was not thrilled about Logan’s decision, to put it mildly. Dad actually thought his little rebellion funny. Mom wasn’t impressed with dad’s attitude, either.

Today, we are going to follow a day in the life of little…
112.title: They throw tantrums and fits about the potty.

choices: If he doesn't want to potty, let him. Put him back in diapers.
A visit from a potty trained friend or cousin could make the potty cool again...
What's making the potty so bad for him? Is it cold? Hard? Let's solve the issue.
Remind him of what a big boy he is, and that big boys use the potty.
1122.content:
Raphael's discovery of the word 'No' caused many problems. 'No' was the new, big answer to anything Raphael didn't like. The car seat, vegetables, naptime, bedtime, clothing that was itchy or restricting, and most especially, the potty.

Raphael had been doing well, all things considered, before then. In training pants, except for the diaper at nap and bedtime, self-initiated a decent amount of tricks, didn't have any problems with either pee or poo, even had some days where he was dry and clean!

But that all changed when the "NO!" attacked.

Suddenly, Raphael hated the potty. He cried. He screamed. He threw tantrums. And 'dry all day' became 'wet and poopy all day', with days where he never even tried to go.

Dad was at his wit's end. He was thinking about some ideas of what to do...
1122.title: …Raphael.

114.content:
Arthur, age two. Arthur is a bright and well-behaved little boy. He will happily sit on his potty when he is told to, and he loves reading his picture books on it. He fully understands that pee-pee and poo-poo belong into the potty. He has no idea how they are supposed to get there. So far, he has done one poop in the potty, mostly by accident. He has also peed on about every surface in the house at least once by now, twice on the bathroom floor right after he got up from his potty. There are poop stains in all his big boy undies. One time he had been standing in front of his potty and peed himself right as his mommy had been praising him for keeping his big boy briefs dry and he had just interrupted her to correct: “Wet.”

Florian, age three. Florian loves his potty and he takes it with him wherever he goes. Usually, by wearing it on his head as a hat. It makes a great hat. It’s also a great place to store his toys in, it makes a decent step-stool, and he can bathe his dolls in it. It floats like a boat in the bathtub. It can be used as a bucket. On occasion, Florian even uses it as a chair. The one thing he has never done is pee or poo in it.

Marcel, age four. Marcel has always done things at his own speed. He gets that the potty is for peeing and pooping in and he isn’t opposed to the concept. However, he has a hard time understanding the difference between undies and diapers. If he is wearing any pants at all, he will use them like diapers.

Stephen, age six. Stephen grew up with his aunt and uncle on an old, rural farm. Stephen has spend more time outdoors, roaming the surrounding wilderness, than indoors. The only toilet at the farm was an old outhouse, basically a hole in the ground, stinky and quite scary to a young child. Stephen used it maybe once or twice in his life. Usually, he would just crouch behind a bush or pee on a tree. So to say he is unfamiliar and uncomfortable with toilets would be an understatement. He has moved to the city recently and started school.

Today, we are going to follow a day in the life of little…
114.title: Doesn't seem to get the concepts.

1143.content: Young Marcel was a bright, peppy lad. He was fine with using the potty, unlike a number of his friends. However, he had one major hangup. He didn't see the difference between training pants, diapers, and undies. He saw them as one in the same. If he was in undies, diapers, or trainers, he'd used them like diapers. Where was he now?
1143.title: …Marcel.

choices: …a pair of briefs, it was a training opportunity.
11432.content: It was a Saturday in late spring. The weather was nice and warm and Marcel’s parents had decided to go to a picnic at the park. So they had packed some lunch, a change of clothes for Marcel and his potty and gone there. Marcel had had a nice strawberry jam sandwich and lots of apple juice, then he went to play on the nearby playground. At the moment, his dad was pushing him on the swings while mom was sitting on a park bench nearby. Because he was still very much in the process of potty training, Marcel was wearing…
11432.title: At the park,

choices: It was the tingle! The tingle that made him wiggle!
It was the push! The push that made his face go red and made him squat.
114322.content:
Marcel was wearing a Pull-Up, in the hopes that the 'cool, when peed in' system, would help him alert to his need to go potty.

Dad was pushing Marcel on the swings, back, and forth, and back, and forth.

Soon, Marcel got bored and stopped. He started to head onto the park when he felt something.
114322.title: …a pull-up.

choices: He pees his pull-up while sliding down.
He makes it down but pees his pull-up while climbing back up.
He finds a hiding place to pee his pull-up.
His mom or dad notice and try to get him to the potty in time.
1143221.content:
Marcel was running towards the climbing tower in the middle of the playground sand pit when he felt a familiar tingle in his weenie. All that apple juice was getting back at him now, Marcel had to pee! He knew he was wearing a diaper, so he could just stop and do it. The problem was: He didn't want to stop! He wanted to climb the tower and play, he didn't have time to pee!

So he kept on running. The tingle persisted, but as long as Marcel stayed in motion, it wasn't so bad. He just couldn't stop. Stay in motion. Never stop. Marcel began climbing the stairs to the tower. He had to slow down and concentrate not to fall and that was making it really hard to continue to ignore the tingle. It was growing worse and worse now and Marcel was starting to do a little potty dance as he stepped over to the top of the slide.
1143221.title: It was the tingle! The tingle that made him wig...

1143222.content: As Marcel was heading into the playground area of the park, he felt something down below. He knew what it was. It was that pushing sensation. Whenever he felt it, he'd pop into a squat, his face would go red, and he'd be in a poopy Pull-Up. What does he do?
1143222.title: It was the push! The push that made his face go...

choices: Mom or dad noticed and lifted him up, trying to take him to the bathroom.
Marcel finished and went to play more.
Marcel finished and went to get out of the poopy Pull-Up.
Mom or dad noticed, but it was too late. All they could do was change him.
11432221.content:
Marcel stopped and squatted, his face growing red.

What happened?
11432221.title: Let nature take its course?

choices: ...led Marcel over to the public restrooms, they were the closest.
...quickly brought Marcel back to where they had left his potty chair.
11432222.content:
Marcel stopped in his tracks and froze for a second as he tried to pigeonhole the sudden sensation from his lower body. His hand moved to cover his rear end almost without him noticing. Then he realised what the feeling was: He had to poop!

"Hey, Ceel, do you have to go potty?" His dad interrupted Marcel's thought process.

Marcel shook his head.

Dad looked him over, suspicious. "Then why do you look like you gotta go number two?"

"'cause I gotta," Marcel said. The pushy feeling was growing inside him and he spread his legs. He instinctively started to lower himself into a squat.

Dad tried to stop him. "Let's quickly sit on the potty," he suggested, "if you poop your diaper, I'll have to change you before you can go back to the playground. But if you use the potty, you can continue playing right away."

Marcel paused in a half-squat. He hadn't considered that. In fact, he hadn't thought of the possibility of taking off his diaper to poop before at all. His mind was blown. Slowly, he got back up. "OK," he agreed and reached for his dad's hand. Dad took his hand and...
11432222.title: For once, use the potty?

choices: They go at the last minute?
They don't want to give up their diapers?
115.content: What other reasons could it be?
115.title: Other.

1151.content:
Tobias, age two and a half. It’s not so much that Tobias waits too long before he tries to go to the potty. It’s just he is still very much figuring out this whole going-potty business and when he realises he has to go, it is usually somewhere on a scale between “I gotta go right now” and “I’m peeing”.

Hikaru, age four. Hikaru is very reliable at home and rarely has any potty accidents. However, this completely changes once he leaves the house. He won’t even tell he has to use the potty until he is only seconds away from wet or brown pants. But Hikaru isn’t doing this out of fear or spite. It’s just that nobody has ever told the poor lad that public restrooms exist and other people own toilets as well.

Joshua, age seven. Little Josh focusses on whatever he is doing a lot. A lot a lot. Sometimes so much so, he doesn’t realise he has to use the bathroom. On occasion, he won’t even notice when he has an accident. Other times, he will panicky realise his need once he feels the first spurt of pee dampen his pants or a little brown turtle pushing out its head. Either way, he still needs the occasional reminder to use the bathroom, or he will have frequent accidents or near-accidents in his pants.

Linus, age eight. Linus still has to wear diapers at night for his bedwetting, but at day he is fully potty trained. Technically, at least. Linus knows perfectly well when he has to use the toilet, he even knows when it is getting urgent, but he doesn’t like going. So he always waits until it is really urgent urgent. Sadly, Linus overestimates his ability to hold it by quite a bit and often ends up with an accident in his pants.

Today, we are going to follow a day in the life of little…
1151.title: They go at the last minute?

choices: Another diaper. He's still early on.
11511.content:
8 AM is when Tobias starts the day. The young toddler wakes up in his crib, pulling his blanket off of him as his mother walks in.

"Morning sweety. Let's get you ready for the day."

Toby, eager to start the day, pokes at the lower half of his body. "Pee pee." he says. He's trying to get mommy to notice his wet night diaper.

"Oh, you noticed! Good. Let's get you out of that wet diaper." Mommy lifts Tobias out of his crib and lays him on the changing table, undoing his PJs and getting his wet diaper off, tossing it away. As she wipes him up, she slides open a drawer and pulls out the undergarment for the day...
11511.title: …Tobias.

11512.content: Little Hikaru was a fun loving boy. He rode his tricycle around the neighborhood, and was a friendly enough kid. He has made progress in potty training, though, for a number of reasons, won't use toilets outside his home, and will often hold it till the last minute. Where is he now?
11512.title: …Hikaru.

choices: …continues to hold it and remains silent.
…asks mommy if they’ll head home soon.
…tells mommy he has to go potty.
…tells mommy he is about to have an accident in his favourite briefs.
…asks mommy to put him in a diaper.
115121.content:
Hikaru was grocery shopping with his mom. He was sitting in the cart and dangling down his legs from the seat. Usually he enjoyed going shopping with his mom. grocery shopping was fun! Hikaru would help and pick up things from the shelves for his mom or put items she handed him into the cart for her. The lady behind the cold-cuts counter would always say he smiled so adoringly and give him a slice to eat for the way. There were many new and interesting things and people to discover at the grocery store, too! Hikaru had met a nice grandma before, a big dog, a small dog, a grandma with a dog… and that was only in the last month!

Today, however, Hikaru was a bit restless. He really needed his mom to hurry and head to the checkout so he could go home! Hikaru nervously scissored his legs and shifted around in the cart seat. He needed to go potty! And bad. Like always, he had sat on the toilet before they left home, just as his mommy always told him to, because there were no toilets outside. But today his body had betrayed him. He hadn’t had to go back when they left, but the urge hit him right as they pulled into the grocery store parking lot.

Hikaru knew there was nowhere for him to go here, so he tried to ignore his need as good as he could. He would just have to hold it till they got back home. This wasn’t the first time Hikaru had been in a similar predicament and for his young age he had developed a surprising ability to wait. What Hikaru hadn’t taken into account, however, was the big sale that day. His mom was taking her sweet time, filling their cart with lots more stuff than usual.

They weren’t half-way through the store yet, and Hikaru already felt that he was really really getting to his limit. They hadn’t even passed the cold-cuts counter and they still got to go through the sweets-section, too! After that they’d have to pay at the checkout and then they’d have to drive all the way back home. Hikaru fidgeted in his seat, feeling queasy. He willed his mom to hurry up. He really really really couldn’t wait much longer. In fact, he wasn’t sure he’d make it even if they started driving home right this moment.

Hikaru frantically tried to come up with a way out, but he just couldn’t think of anything. There were no toilets here. He couldn’t go in his pants because first that would be embarrassing and second mommy would be upset. Hikaru’s eyes grew wide. Oh no! He wore his favourite pair of undies, too! The ones with a picture of the bestest superhero, dinoboy on them. No, no way he was having an accident in his dinoboy briefs! But what other options did he have?

He…
115121.title: At the grocery store

choices: Too late. He has an accident in his pants at the checkout.
To the nearby public restroom. Hikaru manages to wait till they get there.
To the nearby public restroom. Hikaru doesn’t make it.
Back to their car. Hikaru manages to wait till they get there.
Back to their car. Hikaru can’t wait that long.
1151215.content:
Hikaru was getting more and more desperate as mommy slowly pushed their cart with him in it through the store. He barely said hello and thank you to the lady behind the cold-cuts counter when she handed him his slice of sausage. Hikaru gobbled down the tasty morsel and for the shortest moment it distracted him from his need to go potty.

Then the desperation returned with all the more urgency. Hikaru squirmed in his seat. There was no way he was going to make it all the way back home to the potty! They had reached the health & beauty isle and just then they went past the shelves with baby diapers. Hikaru’s eyes boggled as he realised his salvation. “Mom! Diapers!” He cried urgently.

“We still got enough of your night-time diapers at home, honey,” his mom said.

Hikaru interrupted her: “No! Diapers, now! I need a diaper now! I gotta go potty real bad, mommy!”

His mom looked at Hikaru with both surprise and concern. She hadn’t noticed till then. Hikaru was good at hiding his need when he had to go potty, or maybe she hadn’t paid his warning signs enough attention. In any case, when they were out he never told her when he had to go and when he did, it was usually too late. Maybe mommy thought she had finally solved the conundrum and it was just a fear of public toilets. Or she was too happy that Hikaru told her in time just this once. Whatever her reason, she grabbed a pack of the same diapers Hikaru wore at night and handed it to him. “We still gotta pay before I can put you in one,” she warned him, “can you wait that long?”

Hikaru wasn’t sure at all that he could, but he immediately nodded in confirmation nonetheless. He clutched the diaper package in his arms and nervously scissored his legs while his mommy quickly shoved their cart over to the checkout. Luckily there was no wait and mom immediately began to unload their groceries on the conveyor belt. Hikaru placed his diaper package with them and nervously waited for the cashier to scan all their items.

Where is mommy taking Hikaru to change him in a diaper?
1151215.title: …asks mommy to put him in a diaper.

11512151.content: Eventually Hikaru lost the battle. He squeaked, raised himself up a bit, and...
11512151.title: Too late. He has an accident in his pants at th...

11512152.content: Hikaru, just barely, managed to wait. He was bouncing in his seat as mommy paid and brought him into the family bathroom. His mommy undid his pants, and got him into a fresh diaper. Hikaru smiled, and relaxed as he began to...
11512152.title: To the nearby public restroom. Hikaru manages t...

choices: …asks if he is allowed to use the toilets here.
115121523.content:
Hikaru’s eyes grew wide when they entered the restroom. Two toilets hung from the wall, one lower than the other, perfect for a boy his size. There were toilets in this room! “Mommy, potties!” He cried out. Hikaru hadn’t known there existed any toilets away from home.

“I know you have to go, honey! I’m hurrying!” His mom mistook his scream for a plea of desperation. Hikaru fussed and tried to get off the changing table. He had to go so bad and the toilet was right there! Two toilets! But his mommy held him in place. “No! Mommy! I gotta go! I gotta go!” Hikaru wailed.

“I know, I’m working as quick as I can,” his mom cooed. She quickly puled down his pants and undies. Then Hikaru felt his rear end briefly lifted up as she shoved a diaper under his bum. Hikaru didn’t want to be in an icky, messy diaper, he- His thoughts came to an abrupt halt. He couldn’t any longer. Just... couldn't. He was at his limit. A blissful smile crept on Hikaru’s face as he gave in to his need. His mom knew that expression and what it meant. She folded up the diaper just as Hikaru began to fill its seat with a huge and very urgently needed poop and in the brink of time before he followed it up with a strong gush of pee a second later. Hikaru breathed a silent sigh of relief.

Mommy held the diaper in place with her hand and waited until he had finished relieving himself. “All done?” She asked. Hikaru nodded. The blissful smile slowly vanished from his face and was replaced by a frown as the soothing emptiness radiating from his lower abdomen was joined by an old and familiar sensation Hikaru hadn’t felt in a while. The icky-mushy touch of a messy diaper to his skin.

Hikaru…
115121523.title: Pee and Poop Heavily

choices: He gets away and successfully makes it to the toilet.
He gets away but too late. He doesn’t make it to the toilet.
Mommy grabs him and quickly sits him on the toilet.
Mommy lifts him up, but doesn’t get him on the toilet in time.
115121524.content:
Hikaru’s eyes grew wide when they entered the restroom. Two toilets hung from the wall, one lower than the other, perfect for a boy his size. There were toilets in this room! “Mommy, potties!” He cried out. Hikaru hadn’t known there existed any toilets away from home.

“I know you have to go, honey! I’m hurrying!” His mom mistook his scream for a plea of desperation. Hikaru fussed and tried to get off the changing table. He had to go so bad and the toilet was right there! Two toilets! But his mommy held him in place. “No! Mommy! I gotta go! I gotta go!” Hikaru wailed.

“I know, I’m working as quick as I can,” his mom cooed. She quickly puled down his pants and undies. Then Hikaru felt his rear end briefly lifted up as she shoved a diaper under his bum. Hikaru didn’t want to be in an icky, messy diaper, he- His thoughts came to an abrupt halt as he let rip the longest and loudest fart. For a second, it gave him respite from his urgent need, then the desperation hit him again. He tried to wiggle away again. “Potty! Mommy, I wanna use the potty!”
115121524.title: Fart, false alarm

11514.content: Where do we first find Linus?
11514.title: …Linus.

115141.content: What was Linus doing at home?
115141.title: At home

115142.content: Young Joshua was in second grade. He was a bit of a bedwetter, and would often go at the last minute. Currently he's in class when he feels a need to...
115142.title: In school

115143.content: Where else could Linus be
115143.title: Other

1151431.content: We join Linus on a warm, sunny summer day. It is late afternoon the sun is beginning to go down. Linus was racing his new bike around his neighborhood, zipping down the winding hills and looping around the cul de sacs. He peddled as fast as his little legs could go, but at some point he feels the signals coming from his lower region, he feels he needs to...
1151431.title: On a bike ride?

11514311.content: Linus feels that all to familiar pressure in his bladder that tells him he needs to pee. Seeing on how he wanted to keep riding his new bike, Linus kept peddling, ignoring his need. After a while, his need became quite uncomfortable as he had to occasionally stop and squeeze his legs together to keep from leaking. Linus was debating on heading home or not. Should he?
11514311.title: Go pee

115143111.content:
Linus figures he should head home as to not wet his pants. He tries his best to hold it all in, but with each peddle, the need grows stronger. Linus occasionally has to reach down and hold himself to relieve the pressure.

Does he get home with dry pants?
115143111.title: Yes

choices: Pee his pants and keep peddling
115143113.content: What else could do he?
115143113.title: Other

choices: No, he has an accident while riding
11514312.content:
Linus feels a slight cramping feeling in his stomach and knows that he will need to get home and use the potty soon, however, Linus chooses to keep riding away from his house as he feels that there’s no need to cut his fun short just to go potty.

A few minutes later Linus gets tired of peddling and decides to stop for a break, this is when he realizes his need for the potty has grown more urgent and the cramping feeling is worse now. Linus began to worry as he had already had a messy accident this week, it was a few days ago as he was coming home from playing with some neighborhood friends, his mom was not at all happy with him and threatened to use some form of protection if he had another accident.

Now Linus is not too far from his house right now, but he has some riding to do, so he began peddling toward his house, feeling the feeling in his stomach growing slightly more urgent each time he peddled.

Does Linus make it back to his house with clean pants?
11514312.title: Go poop

115143122.content:
Linus peddled hard and fast making his way back home, he got to the halfway point when his stomach cramps hit him hard, he clinched himself and continued peddling, even occasionally putting his hand back there to help hold it.

Linus was about 75% to his house when a massive wave of stomach cramps over came him, this was the worst one yet. The pressure was too much for him and he was tired of holding it all in, a warm mass pushed its way down into Linus’ undies and rested between his legs followed by a few more smaller messes. There was a visible lump sagging in between his legs and the smell started reaching his nose. Linus was officially messy.

He finished his ride back, got to bis front door after putting his bike away, and walked into his house desperately wanting to change and get cleaned up.

Who was home when Linus walked in?
115143122.title: No, he has an accident while riding

1151431221.content:
Linus’ parents were out on a date night tonight, leaving him and his 15 year old brother, Zach, with the house to themselves.

Linus opened the door to his house and walked in, the smelly mess squishing and spreading around his whole crotch area with each step he took. Zach was in the tv room and looked up and greeted Linus as he heard him walk in, but soon the smell fills the room as well as Zach’s nose as he takes a big whiff of the odor.

“Hey Linus can you come here for a second?” Zach says.

Linus reluctantly listens to his brother and sheepishly walks over to him, he knows whats about to happen. Linus gets to the couch where Zach is sitting, Zach has him face away from him and Linus feels the waist band of his pants and underwear being pulled open as Zach assesses the damage in his brother’s pants, “oh my gosh, Linus you are covered in poo!” Zach lets the waistbands go with a snap. “You should go have a shower to clean yourself up.”

“Ok” is all Linus says in embarrassment as he walks toward the bathroom to shower. He waddles his way there and shuts the door behind him. Linus did not really know where to start in cleaning up this mess, his mom was usually there to help him whenever he had an accident, he slowly pulls his pants and underwear down to his ankles, this is when he realized just how much he had to clean up, he was sheepish and slowly took a wet wipe to his crotch area. Linus thinks about asking his brother for help, does he?
1151431221.title: Only his older brother

11514312211.content:
Linus trys to wipe his bottom but his hand is met with the sticky mess that is covering him. Frustrated, he opens the door and calls for his brother, “Zaaaaach” he calls.

“What?” His brother yells from the other room.

“Can you help me?” The boy calls out again like a toddler.

With a deep sigh Zach gets up off the couch and heads toward the bathroom. He walks in to find his messy little brother with his pants around his ankles, the look on his dace more resembled a frustrated toddler than an 8 year old boy. Zach gagged as he entered the bathroom the smell was overwhelming. The older boy put his shirt over his nose and lifted Linus into the bathtub. Next, he got out some wet wipes and began applying them anywhere there was poop, it took about 6 wipes total to have the boy clean enough to shower without making a huge mess.

“Alright, do you think you could get the rest with the shower?” Zach asked.

Linus nodded, it wasnt the first time he had to do this, and likely will not be the last, as potty training has been a very long journey for Linus, he still seems to avoid using the potty for some reason.

Linus cleans himself well enough in the shower and exits the bathroom with a towel on. “Hey Linus,” zach calls to him, “I think we should put your pjs on now so we dont have to later.” This was code for, “I’m going to put you in a diaper for the night.” In this household as Linus’ parents have been trying to avoid using the term “diaper” around the house as to promote his potty training.

“Ok” is all Linus says back as he walks up to his room.

Now we know that Linus is still a bedwetter and wears protection at night, but what type of protection does he wear?
11514312211.title: Yes

choices: No, just go shirt and diaper
115143122111.content:
So Linus wears tape diapers to bed to minimize leaks and make clean up easy in the morning. Luckily for him, Pampers has just started coming out with tape diapers for older kids like him, they have resealable tapes in case he has to use the bathroom and they have designs for older kids like race cars and sports designs.

Linus got to his room and began drying off, as he did, Zach entered and went right towards his closet where his diapers, powder, and wipes were. When Linus was dry he set his towel on his bed and lay down on it naked. Zach brings over the supplys and first checks if his brother did a good job cleaning himself, which he did. Next, Zach pours on the baby powder applying it to his brother’s crotch area as well as his bottom. He then slides the fresh diaper under Linus’ butt and tapes it tightly on his waist. Zach gave Linus a shirt to put on and then asked him if he wanted any pants for tonight.
115143122111.title: Tape diaper

1151431221111.content:
“No im good, its too hot for pants.” Linus answered mainly because he liked wearing as little clothes as possible. The two brothers walked downstairs, one wearing regular clothes and one in nothing but a t-shirt and diaper.

“Linus please remember to use the bathroom when you need to ok? I dont want to have to change another diaper tonight,” zach warned.

“I know i know!” Linus had heard it all before, but what his family doesnt understand is that it is easier said than done, for him at least.

The two boys sit next to each other on the living room couch. Zach threw on a movie that they both liked and told Linus he could stay up for a while past his bedtime, which helped cheer him up a little. After about a half hour of the movie, Linus felt the need to pee building up, it was not too urgent at the moment, but he knew he should go soon.

What does Linus do?
1151431221111.title: No, just go shirt and diaper

11514312211111.content:
Linus decides that he should avoid having an accident at all costs because he didnt want to make his big brother mad. Linus got up and went straight to the bathroom. He stood in front of the toilet, removed the tapes of his diaper and held his shirt up. Linus successfully used the potty.

He returned to his brother, diaper in hand, and was rewarded with a bug high five, they're mother had always told Zach to encourage his brother when it came to using the bathroom. Linus lay down in front of his brother, who quickly retaped his diaper on him and unpaused the movie.

As the movie finished up, Zach looked over at his brother, Linus was fast asleep curled up in a ball on the couch. Zach smiled and picked Linus up, and brought him upstairs to his room, tucking him under the covers if his bed. Zach then shut out the lights and shut the door.

The next morning...
11514312211111.title: Go to the bathroom now

As time went on the need came back even stronger, and Linus knew he did not have much more time before his pee was going to come out, either in the toilet or in the diaper.

What does he do now
11514312211112.title: Hold it a little longer

“See what happens when you dont go right away, Linus, you end up soaked.” Zach was frustrated with his brother because he knew his accidents were just out of laziness, he was too old to have accidents all the time.

As Linus walked back to the couch Zach stopped him as he walked by and felt his diaper to see how wet it was.

Linus began to wake up as his brother untaped his diaper and started wiping him. Next came the powder and a new diaper. Linus got under his covers and his brother turned out the light and shut his door. The fresh dry diaper felt alot better to Linus and he was soon fast asleep.

Linus got to a point where he had to constantly shift around his body to keep from messing himself. Does Linus choose to use the bathroom?

Linus gets tired of holding it and decides to use his diaper instead of getting up. He relaxed and felt the mess find its way into his diaper and spread around his groin area. Linus didnt mind being dirty for a little bit and he continued his game.

After a while Linus decided to get up...

After about 30 more minutes of playing in bed, Linus felt it was time to get his day rolling. He sat up in his bed, which only further spread around the mushy mess that was already all over his diaper area, as he stood up the diaper sagged so much that Linus felt it touch the back of his legs with every step he took, this was complete with a very loud crinkle sound with any move he made.

He walked out of his room and toddled his way down the stairs and into the kitchen, where Zach was already sitting at the table eating pancakes and his mother was up and cooking. Linus sat at the chair next to Zach, Zach took one look at his little brother as he sat next to him, he heard an audible squish sound mixed with a loud, damp crinkle, he saw the faded designs on the saggy diaper, and worst of all the smell had shot right up to his nose as the boy sat down. Zach covered his nose and said,”uh oh mom, we have another disaster diaper this morning from the stinker.”

Their mom only sighed and handed the younger boy his pancakes, she knew Linus had grown way too used to his diapers and adamantly chose them over going to the potty most if the time. His morning diapers have been disaster lately as the boy has been getting more and more comfortable with using his diaper. She knew she had to do something about this soon or risk Linus never getting potty trained.

The two boys sat and ate together, the whole time Linus was visibly shifting his weight around in the diaper feeling the mess spread around his legs. Linus finished eating and brought his plate to the sink. “Alright stinker we need to go change your pants.” His mom said, they both walk upstairs to the bathroom where Linus lays down on the floor. His mom untapes the diaper and wipes his legs clean with wet wipes, the whole time Linus is laid back with his hands behind his head and a smile across his face. His mom finished cleaning him up and then got him into the shower snd left the bathroom. After the shower Linus returned to his room, his mom was in there picking out his clothes for the day, she laid out his shorts and shirt and went to grab a pair of underwear when the opened package if diapers sitting next to the dresser caught her eye...

What does mom pick out for underwear?

“Linus lay down on the bed for me.” Mom said, she reached into the package of diapers and got one out, she was reluctant to put him back in diapers all day but at the same time she was sick of his “accidents” and felt that it was the best option.

Linus smiled and hopped up on the bed and undid his towel, he knew he was getting diapered for the day and now he didnt have to worry about rushing to the toilet today.

Just like that, the nearly 9 year old boy was put into a diaper during the day. Linus reclined on the couch with his brother as their morning shows played on, afternoon rolled around and Linus felt his stomach grumble, he sat up on the couch, “Im hungry, we should make some lunch.” Linus said to Zach.

“Sure, lets go see what we have.” Zach said. The two boys wandered to the kitchen and began to scan the cabinets and fridge for food. “Do you want mac n cheese?” Zach asked taking it from the shelf.

“Sure.” Was all Linus said back as he wandered about the kitchen. Zach got out everything he needed for the mac n cheese and got the water boiling. He then turned to Linus and noticed that his brother’s butt was padded and he waddled as he moved around.

“Are you wearing a diaper?” Zach asked him.

Linus stopped moving and looked over at his brother, he blushed as this question was embarrassing for an eight year old to hear. But, Zach knew all too well that Linus has been having accidents lately as he often chose to have an accident rather than interrupt what he was doing at the time. “Yeah, mom told me i needed to wear one today.” Linus responded.

This worried Zach, he felt that if his mom was going to put him in diapers for the day, it would only allow him to keep using his pants rather than the potty. Zach felt the need to tell Linus, “Ok but please can you make sure to tell me when you need the bathroom, ‘cus i really dont want to have to change you”.

“I know, i wont have accidents today, promise.” Linus said proudly. He actually wanted to try to avoid making his brother upset with him and felt that he should be good for him today.

The boys watched tv until their mac n cheese was done. Zach and Linus ate and talked in the kitchen. As they were finishing up, Zach noticed how Linus was beginning to fidget with himself, “Linus do you need to use the bathroom?” He asked.

Zach sets a plate in front of his brother and one for himself. The two boys start eating and making small talk. Zach decided to address Linus’ accident earlier, “So what happened earlier bud? How did you come home so messy?” Zach said.

Linus was visibly embarrassed by this, his face grew red and he started avoiding eye contact, “i dont know, i was biking around and it just came out, i couldnt do anything about it.” Linus did a poor job explaining this and his brother knew it, whenever Linus was asked about his accidents, they were never his fault.

“Well i think you should start paying better attention to when you need to use the bathroom, alright dude?” His brother said. Linus only nodded and quickly changed the subject to something else.

The boys started off a game, Zach decided that he would go easy for the first 3 quarters of the game, Linus even lead by 10 points. However, as the 4th quarter started, Zach started closing the lead. Unknown to Zach, Linus had been suppressing his need to pee since the game had started, and now it was getting urgent. Linus began to shift around to distract himself from the pressure on his bladder, but he needed to go soon, be it in the potty or in his pull-up.

Linus is determined to finish this close game, bit he knows that if wants any chance of making it to the toilet on time, he would probably have to pause it as there is about 10 minutes left.

You have to stop distracting yourself from using the bathroom, youre getting too old to not be able to make it to the bathroom.” Linus was officially embarrassed, he wasnt expecting to flood the pull-up like that, he only wanted to relieve himself enough to focus on the game.

Linus waddled his way up to the bathroom where he slid the wet t-shirt off his body and soaked pull-up down his legs, wrapped it up, and threw it in the trash. 11514312211211221.title: Bedtime

1153.content:
Nicola, age three. Nicola has recently been acquainted with the potty. He is happy enough to pee in it and is almost completely accident free by now. However, he absolutely refuses to poop into anything but a diaper. Once he has held it for three days straight until his parents carved in and put him in a diaper. Nicola is strong-willed and determined and he has a surprising amount of control for his age, his mom couldn’t even “convince” him to use the potty with a glycerin suppositoriy. He stubbornly waited out its effect to pass.

Jamal, age three and a half. Jamal doesn’t like the potty. He doesn’t like the toilet either. Nor does he want to pee on a tree or in the bushes, he doesn’t see why this would be “exciting”, thank you very much. Jamal understands that undies aren’t diapers and can’t be used as such. And he tries not to, honest! But it is hard waiting all day until he is put in a diaper for his afternoon nap or at bedtime in the evening and sometimes he just doesn’t make it. If his mommy and daddy only listened to him and put him back in diapers during the day, none of them would have this problem!

Linus, age eight. Linus still has to wear diapers at night for his bedwetting, but at day he is fully potty trained. Technically, at least. Linus likes the feeling of wearing a diaper. He has learned early how to diaper himself and he often “secretly” puts on one of his night-time diapers during the day. Apparently, his mom can’t count and doesn’t notice him going through diapers far faster than he should. More likely, though, she just lets Linus keep his “secret”. Linus doesn’t really intend to use his diapers, but of cause at some point he either has to or he has to take them off to use the toilet. Since he is unhappy to waste a perfectly good diaper like that, he usually ends up holding it as long as he can before he goes in his diaper after all. He doesn’t like sitting in a full diaper and quickly changes out of them.

Victor, age thirteen. Victor recently found an old pack of his night-time diapers from back when he still wet the bed as a child. It was quite the tight fit, but out of curiosity, he tried one on. He kinda liked the feeling. And he tried using it. He kinda liked that, too. Since then, he has continued to secretly wear them and has long since used up that diaper treasure he found. Yesterday, he finally worked up the courage and bought a pack of pull-ups for bedwetters for himself. He had biked all the way to the next town over just to make sure he wouldn’t run into anyone he knew.

Today, we are going to follow a day in the life of…

Brad had been feeling the little tingle in his tummy for a while now. That little tickle-pricke which told him he needed to stop playing and head to the potty. But he did not want to interrupt their game! The two boys had just cleared an especially difficult obstacle on their fourth try, and there was just no way Brad could leave now in the middle of the level.

Just at that moment, Ryan dropped his controller and panicky grabbed his crotch. He gasped: “I gotta pee! I’m gonna pee!”

“Hey! Don’t-”, Brad complained, but it was too late, Ryan’s character got eaten by a Koopa. Brad sighed, angry: “Aww, man! Why’d you do that?”

Ryan didn’t hear him. He had been so absorbed in their game, he hadn’t paid attention to the signals of his body and only just realised he had to pee when he was about to wet himself. He desperately held himself. His pee wanted to come out so bad, he could feel it tickling right at the tip of his weenie, about to leak out!

Ryan didn’t want that. He wanted to be a big boy who was allowed to wear big boy undies. Big boys didn’t wet their diapers! He remembered Brad’s mommy had shown him where Brad’s potty was in the bathroom. Somehow, he managed to scramble to his feet. He made a beeline for the door. Brad got up a bit slower and toddled after his friend, nervously pressing his legs together now that he didn’t have the game any more to distract him from his own need to pee.

Ryan Gets Ashley to Get Brad a New Diaper
11545111111111121121.content:
When Ryan opened the door, he found that Brad had wet his diaper. The padding of Brad's diaper was now as yellow as the tapes that held it up.

"Ryan, what's the big deal leaving me behind?" Brad asked Ryan angrily.

"I'm sorry, Brad. I really had to pee, and I didn't want anyone to see me while I went." Ryan told Brad.

"Well, your diaper may be dry, but mine's all wet." Brad told Ryan.

"Don't worry, Brad. If you can help me get my diaper back on, I can get you a dry diaper to wear." Ryan told Brad.

"It's a deal!" said Brad, and the two toddlers went into the bathroom. Brad picked up Ryan's untaped diaper. Ryan pulled up his shirt and held still as Brad taped his diaper back onto his bottom.

"Thanks, Brad." said Ryan, then he went to wash his hands.

Does Ryan decide to get Brad a new diaper by himself, or does he get Ashley, Brad's mom to do it?
11545111111111121121.title: Brad Had Wet His Diaper

115451111112.content: Were they playing Super Marquez Fiesta on Vinchenzo Swatch?
115451111112.title: Something Else

1154511112.content:
Then was it...

Allison Emily "Alice" Finklemeyer, age two-and-a-half. Alice is a beautiful Jewish girl with long, blonde hair and baby blue eyes. She's as kind as she is beautiful, and has won Brad's heart, though the two have settled on being just really good friends for now. Alice still wore diapers, but was getting used to the potty. She likes being potty-trained because she likes not needing her diaper changed, and longs for the day when she can wear big-girl panties.
1154511112.title: Someone Else

11545111122.content: Were both Ryan and Alice visiting Brad's house that day?
11545111122.title: No, someone else

115451111221.content:
Both Ryan and Alice were visiting Brad's house that day.

What were the three toddlers playing?
115451111221.title: Yes

choices: Newer Super Marquez Bros. Deluxe on Vinchenzo Swatch
1154511112211.content: What video game were Brad, Ryan, and Alice playing?
1154511112211.title: Video Games

11545111122112.content: Were they playing Super Marquez Fiesta on Vinchenzo Swatch?
11545111122112.title: Something Else

choices: One or More of Them Needed to Use the Bathroom
115451111221121.content:
Brad, Ryan, and Alice were all playing Super Marquez Fiesta, a party game based on Super Marquez Bros. for the Vinchenzo Swatch. Each toddler chose a character to play as. Brad chose Marquez, Ryan chose Luis, and Alice chose Princess Plum. The game also chose a lizard named Dante as a computer player to play with them. The board they chose was Palmtree Paradise, a beach-themed board. Each character took turns moving across the board, trying to collect silver stars. The goal of the game was to collect the most silver stars within 20 turns.

As the three toddlers played the game, what happened?
115451111221121.title: Yes

1154511112211211.content: Did more than one toddler need to use the bathroom or just one?
1154511112211211.title: One or More of Them Needed to Use the Bathroom

11545111122112111.content: How many toddlers needed to use the bathroom?
11545111122112111.title: More Than One

115451111221121111.content: Which two toddlers needed to use the bathroom?
115451111221121111.title: Two

1154511112211211113.content: Brad had to pee and poop, while Alice had to pee. Brad squats down and uses his diaper. ALice...
1154511112211211113.title: Brad and Alice

11545111122112111131.content:
Alice didn't want to wet her diaper, so she decided to make a run for the bathroom.

Does she make it?
11545111122112111131.title: Goes potty

115451111221121111311.content:
Alice was relieved to find that the bathroom door was open and no one was inside, and that Brad's potty was sitting next to the toilet. She ran inside and closed the door, then she untaped her diaper and sat down on Brad's potty. As soon as her cheeks touched the seat, she sighed with relief as she peed. She peed until her bladder was empty and Brad's potty was full. When she was all finished, she climbed off the potty, emptied it into the toilet, and flushed it. Before she left, she decided to put her diaper back on.

Did she succeed in getting it back on?
115451111221121111311.title: Yes

choices: Ashley Took Brad Away to Change His Diaper
1154511112211211113111.content:
Alice taped her diaper back onto her bottom, relieved that it was still dry. She then washed her hands in the sink, and ran back to Brad and Ryan to continue their game.

When she got back, what did she find?
1154511112211211113111.title: Yes

choices: Get Ashley to Change Brad's Diaper
Try to Ignore the Odor of Brad's Dirty Diaper
11545111122112111131112.content:
When Alice got back, she found Ryan holding his nose.

"Ryan, what's wrong?" Alice asked Ryan.

"Something smells really bad, and I know it's not me." Ryan told Alice, and he was right. Though he didn't have to use the bathroom at that moment, Ryan's diaper was still completely clean. Like Alice, Ryan liked being potty-trained because he liked not needing his diaper changed.

"Well, I just used the potty, so I know it's not me, either." Alice told Ryan. They soon found out that the bad smell was coming from Brad, as his diaper was now both dirty and wet.

What do Ryan and Alice decide to do?
11545111122112111131112.title: Ryan Holding His Nose

choices: Alice has to pee and poop
11545111122112112.title: Just One

choices: Ask Someone to Take Him to the Bathroom
Make a Run For the Bathroom
115451111221121121.content:
About the second turn into the game, Ryan felt a strong need to pee. He really didn't want to wet his diaper, for he wanted to be a big boy who was allowed to wear big boy underwear. Big boys didn't wear diapers, let alone wet them.

"Guys, I really gotta pee." Ryan said to Brad and Alice.

"Aw, can't it wait?" Brad asked Ryan.

"I'm afraid not." Ryan said to Brad.

What does Ryan do?
115451111221121121.title: Ryan had to pee

1154511112211211212.content:
Ryan decided to make a run for the bathroom.

Does he make it?
1154511112211211212.title: Make a Run For the Bathroom

11545112.content: Does Brad spend the day at one of his friends' houses?
11545112.title: Somewhere Else

115451121.content: Whose house does Brad go to?
115451121.title: Yes

1154511212.content: Does he go to Alice's house?
1154511212.title: Somewhere Else

choices: They would rather  hold it in and burst rather than  use the potty
They are scared of the potty

115454.title: Other.

1154542.content: Are they scared of the potty itself, or something connected to it?
1154542.title: They are scared of the potty

choices: Progress is slow and training is taking a long time.
They throw tantrums and fits about the potty.
They don't quite seem to get the basic concepts.
12.content: What is this girl's major problem, preventing her from training well/quickly/easily?
12.title: Girl

choices: Understands what to do but doesnt want to
121.content: They seem to be grasping it slowly... but why is this
121.title: Progress is slow and training is taking a long ...

122.content:
Okay, then. Will the subject of our story be...

Jillian Emily Johnson, age two and a half. Jillian is the oldest of the Johnson sisters, being three minutes older than Jane and six minutes older than Janet. Jillian is constantly in a bad mood and will lash out at anyone, though she hates boys more than girls. She thinks that girls are better than boys at everything. Though she takes delight in bossing her sisters around, she objects to anyone else doing it. She has a frenemy relationship with Alice. She wants to be friends with her, but feels that can only happen if Alice spent more time playing with girls and less time playing with boys. Of the three Johnson sisters, she is the most difficult to get potty trained. She'll throw tantrums and fits even if someone asks her very nicely to use her potty, and sometimes wets and/or dirties her diaper on purpose.
122.title: They throw tantrums and fits about the potty.

1221.content: Where was Jillian spending the day today?
1221.title: Jillian

choices: How to tell when they have to go
124.content: ALright then, what don't they get about the whole potty training business?
124.title: They don't quite seem to get the basic conc...

choices: They don't initiate trips on their own. They get a parent to take them potty.
They're reliant on timers to go potty. They go on a schedule.
When the diaper goes on for naps and bedtime and car rides, they stop caring.
They can pee fine, but they don't like pooping in the potty.
1243.content: What concept do they not get?
1243.title: Other

12431.content:
Okay, will the subject of this story be...

Janet Charlotte Johnson, age two and a half. She's the youngest of the Johnson sisters, being six minutes younger than JIllian and three minutes younger than Jane. She's also the sweetest and nicest of them, having no animosity towards boys whatsoever. She has an obvious crush on Brad, who unfortunately sees her as annoying and crazy. Janet does try to use the potty, but she can never make it to the bathroom on her own, and often has to have one of her parents or Jane take her there.
12431.title: They don't initiate trips on their own. The...

124311.content: Where was Janet spending the day today?
124311.title: Janet

12434.content: Like other children her age, the lass in quistion was fine with peeing in the potty, but pooping? No way Jose. The question is, was it in the potty in general, at home, or in public?
12434.title: They can pee fine, but they don't like poop...

124343.content: what about the public bathrooms bothers this little lass
124343.title: Public

1243431.content:
The public bathrooms are too noisey and crowded for her, so she has trouble "going" where there are other people in the bathroom.

Now, who do we follow?

Juniper, age 3. Doesn't like using the potty when others aside from family are in there?

Anna, age 4. Will wait til the bathroom is empty before going.
1243431.title: busy and noisey

choices: They Go At the Last Minute
They Don't Want to Give Up Their Diapers
125.content: What other reasons could it be?
125.title: Other.

choices: They Find the Potty Boring or Uninteresting, They'd Rather Be Playing
They Don't Understand that Underwear and Training Pants are Not Diapers
1253.content: What other reasons could it be?
1253.title: Something Else

12532.content:
Who do we follow?

* Janet Charlotte Johnson, Age 3. She's the youngest of the Johnson sisters, being six minutes younger than Jillian, and three minutes younger than Jane. She's also sweetest and nicest of the Johnson sisters, having no animosity towards boys whatsoever. She has an obvious crush on Brad Hunter, who unfortunately for her, sees her as annoying and crazy, and only has eyes for Alice Finklemeyer. As she and her sisters just turned three, they stopped wearing diapers.
12532.title: They Don't Understand that Underwear and Tr...

125321.content:
The Johnson sisters had just turned three. Jane was the easiest to potty-train, being the brains, but her sisters, Jillian and Janet, not so much. Jillian due to her stubborn nature, only choosing to sit on her potty when she felt like it, and Janet, due to her naivety, knowing when she has to go, but often relying on somebody to take her to the bathroom, namely her parents or her sisters. As part of their plan to speed up the potty-training process, the Johnson sisters' parents, David and Jennifer, decided to have them stop wearing diapers.

What did the Johnson sisters wear instead of diapers?
125321.title: Janet

1253212.content:
David and Jennifer bought Jillian, Jane, and Janet each pairs of panties they could wear instead of diapers now that they were three years old. Each pair of panties matched the colors of the dresses they wore; Jillian's was blue, Jane's was pink, and Janet's was green.

"Now girls, you're big girls now and you don't wear diapers anymore. You use your potties if you have to pee or poop. You wear these big-girl panties, and you cannot get them dirty or wet. Do you understand?" David asked Jillian, Jane, and Janet.

"Yes, Daddy." Jillian and Jane said in unison. Janet, however, didn't quite understand that panties are not diapers, and that she wasn't supposed to pee or poop in them.

"I pee-pee my big-girl panties, I poop in my big-girl panties." said Janet. Both David and Jane blushed in embarrassment when they heard this.

Where were the Johnson sisters spending the day today?
1253212.title: Underwear

info.brief_description: Some children toilet train easily. Not these kids. This is for the slow and the tantrumy.
info.description:
For every potty wonder child who takes to it like a fish to water, there's a kid who doesn't. Whether it's because they take forever, throw massive fits, are two-steps-forward-one-step-back, have a ton of accidents, backslide after making progress, or some other reason, these kids are not easy trainers.

Quick and easy rules: Don't be a creep, be logical, do your homework, and try to keep it realistic.
info.pretty_title: Potty Training Can Be A Nightmare!
